name: SafelistTest
description: Unit tests for the Safelist class, focusing on the copy constructor and validation of tags, attributes, and protocols.

test_cases.name: testCopyConstructor_noSideEffectOnTags
test_cases.description: Tests that the copy constructor of Safelist does not have side effects on tags.

test_cases.name: testCopyConstructor_noSideEffectOnAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests that the copy constructor of Safelist does not have side effects on attributes.

test_cases.name: testCopyConstructor_noSideEffectOnEnforcedAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests that the copy constructor of Safelist does not have side effects on enforced attributes.

test_cases.name: testCopyConstructor_noSideEffectOnProtocols
test_cases.description: Tests that the copy constructor of Safelist does not have side effects on protocols.

test_cases.name: noscriptIsBlocked
test_cases.description: Tests that the 'NOSCRIPT' tag is blocked and throws a ValidationException.
